snippet: It is the first time the militant group has released a video showing such a killing outside of the territory it controls in Syria and Iraq.
abstract: Video released by Libyan branch of Islamic State shows simultaneous execution of at least 12 Egyptian Christians who were taken hostage in Libya; bears logo of Islamic State's media arm, indicating closer collaboration between ISIS and its satellite groups than previously thought.

byline.original: By DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK and RUKMINI CALLIMACHI

lead_paragraph: It is the first time the militant group has released a video showing such a killing outside of the territory it controls in Syria and Iraq.

headline.main: Islamic State Video Shows Beheadings of Egyptian Christians in Libya
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Video Shows Beheadings of Egyptian Christians in Libya

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
